title: Diagnostic
content: Is there clarity in the department regarding actions, objectives, and strategy. Is everyone committed to the department's objective? What data is created, needed, and used?

title: Analytics Engineering and Commercial Business Plan
content: With analytics engineering, I ensure that the data is useful for analysis: I design dimensional models (star schema) for dashboards, complex SQL queries for business metrics, and document standardized KPI definitions.

title: Business Intelligence and Visualization
content: With business intelligence, I create daily visual tools that keep our KPIs and reports up-to-date, used by all decision-makers. Creative dashboards that all departments can read and understand.

title: Forecasting Models and Data Culture
content: And now, I can integrate forecasting models. Let's continue digging deeper into data culture.
